trans-unit.source: How To: Delete a Service Namespace
trans-unit.target: How To: Delete a Service Namespace

trans-unit.source: How To: Delete a Service Bus Service Namespace
trans-unit.target: How To: Delete a Service Bus Service Namespace

trans-unit.source: The following topic describes how to delete a <token>servicensd</token> from a <token>sb2</token> subscription.
trans-unit.target: The following topic describes how to delete a <token>servicensd</token> from a <token>sb2</token> subscription.

trans-unit.source: To delete a <token>servicensd</token>, in the list of namespaces select the <token>servicensd</token> you want to delete.
trans-unit.target: To delete a <token>servicensd</token>, in the list of namespaces select the <token>servicensd</token> you want to delete.

trans-unit.source: To select the namespace, click anywhere to the right of the <embeddedLabel>Namespace Name</embeddedLabel> field (do not click on the name itself), then click <ui>Delete</ui>.
trans-unit.target: To select the namespace, click anywhere to the right of the <embeddedLabel>Namespace Name</embeddedLabel> field (do not click on the name itself), then click <ui>Delete</ui>.

trans-unit.source: Note that if you delete a <token>servicensd</token>, that name will become available for re-use within the same subscription after a few minutes.
trans-unit.target: Note that if you delete a <token>servicensd</token>, that name will become available for re-use within the same subscription after a few minutes.

trans-unit.source: However, the name is blocked for re-use in any other subscription for 7 days.
trans-unit.target: However, the name is blocked for re-use in any other subscription for 7 days.

trans-unit.source: This enables you to delete a namespace and re-create it, while locking the name so that no one else can use it.
trans-unit.target: This enables you to delete a namespace and re-create it, while locking the name so that no one else can use it.

trans-unit.source: If you want to use the namespace name in a different subscription, you can either wait for 7 days, or you can re-create the namespace under the old subscription and then create a support ticket to have that namespace moved to a different subscription.
trans-unit.target: If you want to use the namespace name in a different subscription, you can either wait for 7 days, or you can re-create the namespace under the old subscription and then create a support ticket to have that namespace moved to a different subscription.
